mapper.select: select productNum, productName, description, price, amount, p.p_categoryNum, p.companyNum, productImage, pc.p_categoryName, c.companyName from product p, product_category pc, company c where p.p_categoryNum = pc.p_categoryNum and p.companyNum = c.companyNum order by productNum

select productNum, productName, description, price, amount, p.p_categoryNum, p.companyNum, productImage, pc.p_categoryName, c.companyName from product p, product_category pc, company c where p.p_categoryNum = pc.p_categoryNum and p.companyNum = c.companyNum and productNum = #{productNum}
mapper.update: update product set productName = #{productName}, price = #{price}, description = #{description}, amount = #{amount}, productImage=#{productImage} where productNum = #{productNum}
mapper.insert: insert into product (productNum, companyNum, p_categoryNum, productName, description, price, amount, productImage) values (seq_product.nextval, #{companyNum}, #{p_categoryNum}, #{productName}, #{description}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{productImage})
mapper.select: select productImage from product where productNum = #{productNum}

select pc2.* from product_category pc1 inner join product_category pc2 on pc1.p_categoryNum = pc2.p_parentCategory where pc1.p_categoryNum = #{p_categoryNum}
